messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of attacks are treated like firearms?
Ranged missile attacks
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill is used to oppose thrown weapons?
Dodge skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Under what condition can a character fight back against a thrown or missile attack?
Within one-fifth of the attacker's DEX in feet
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Do half of the attacker's damage bonus apply to crossbows?
No, crossbows are not affected
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can a character flee melee combat?
Yes, a character can use their action to flee melee combat on their turn in the order of combat, as long as they have an escape route and are not physically restrained.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does armor affect damage received?
Armor reduces damage received, deducting the number of armor points from damage inflicted by attacks passing through the armor.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of attacks are not reduced by armor?
Magical attacks, poison, drowning, etc. are not reduced by armor.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if a character hits someone on the head from the rear?
Hitting someone on the head from the rear would automatically succeed, unless fumbled.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does armor reduce?
damage received
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What types of attacks are not reduced by armor?
magical attacks
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when attacking someone on the head from the rear?
automatically succeeds
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who decides when dice rolls are called for?
the Keeper
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if a character attacks an unseen target from the rear?
The attack would automatically succeed, unless fumbled.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does a character's number of opponents affect combat attacks?
A character is at a disadvantage if outnumbered by the opposition.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What applies to attacks made using firearms in combat?
No bonus die applies to attacks made using firearms.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should the Keeper do after a surprise attack has been resolved?
Switch to combat rounds as detailed below.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the requirement for a character to be at a disadvantage in combat?
a character is outnumbered by the opposition
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can characters use firearms in situations where they are outnumbered?
No, this does not apply to attacks made using firearms.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can characters with multiple attacks per round dodge or fight back that number of times before gaining a bonus die?
Yes, characters and monsters that have more than one attack per round may also dodge or fight back that number of times
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can investigators outnumber certain Mythos entities?
Note that some Mythos entities can never be outnumbered by investigators
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the rule for characters and monsters with more than one attack per round?
They can dodge or fight back that number of times before the bonus die is applied.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the rule for investigators when facing Mythos entities that can never be outnumbered?
It is not specified in the text.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the order of attack in combat, according to the text?
Highest DEX goes first.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the rule for resolving combat when a defender chooses to dodge?
The combat is resolved in DEX order.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when the attacker has a higher level of success?
Attacker wins
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the outcome when both the attacker and defender fail?
No damage inflicted.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the outcome when the draw occurs?
Defender wins.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when the attacker or defender wins?
Attacker wins or defender wins, respectively.
